description: {"blocks":[{"key":"49p5k","text":"Fluorescence activity assay for Synechococcus PCC 6803 strains during the interlaboratory study published by Mager et al. 2023.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Preculture conditions of the fluorescence activity assay
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bnb6r","text":"Precultures were started from cultures derived from cryoconserved cells after 48h of growth in copper free BG11-PC medium (hereafter referred to as BG11 medium).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"egsfe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4nvg7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a8i9i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a0ukf","text":"4 Strains were used for the fluorescence activity assay in the Interlab study. All strains were Synechocystis PCC 6803 mutants carrying a fluorescence reporter gene.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2kd87","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7b8fd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"96ris","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1murk","text":"Please refer to our protocol \"Cryo_conservation_Synechocystis_PCC_6803\" for more details on growing PCC 6803 from cryo conserved cells and our protocol \"BG11_and_inducer_preparation\" for the preparation of copper free BG11-PC medium","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"41dps","text":"Please refer to our manuscript for more details on the plasmids. plasmid maps can be found in our figshare repository under ......","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ukdk","text":"Transfer all cultures into 50ml falcons","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r9sp","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3c5e2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d86lq","text":"Keep the flasks steril !","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"58jku","text":"Dilute 500 µl of your sample with 500µl of BG11 in a spectrophometer cuvette","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d83at","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6ttli","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"pkuk","text":"For the sample at timepoint 24h, instead dilute 200µl in 800µl of BG11.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c1v75","text":"All measured samples should only be measured in the assumed linear range of OD730 from 0.1-0.5.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Fluorescence- and OD730 measurements in the plate reader
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bcckn","text":"For each strain, fill 3 wells of a black, flat-bottomed 96 well plate with 100 µl of your sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Preculture conditions of the fluorescence activity assay
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ev0e6","text":"Dilute all strains to an OD730 of 0.3 in 35ml of BG11 final volume in a 100ml Erlenmeyer flaks with a cotton plug","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fqg9d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqlst","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2j8om","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e7kla","text":"Supply 10 µg mL-1 chloramphenicol, which is added individually to each flask before inoculation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Preculture conditions of the fluorescence activity assay
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ic71","text":"Grow all cultures in shaking incubators set at 100 rpm under 50 µmol photons · m-2  · s-1 constant white light illumination, ambient CO2, and 30°C over night until OD730 0.5-0.6","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":135,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6uja4","text":"Adjust the OD730 of all cultures to 0.5 with BG11 containing 10 µg mL-1 chloramphenicol to a final volume of 50 ml","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8suob","text":"Measure the full 400-750 nm OD730 spectrum and OD730 nm of these cultures","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"311ni","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"copss","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ec55p","text":"This is your timepoint 0h value for the absorption spectrum. Refer to the last section of this manuscript for details on OD measurements.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5uht8","text":"Rinse the preculture flasks with 25 ml Copper-free BG11 twice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":56,"length":5}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"207af","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17r8n","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6dljd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9dbb7","text":"This is used to remove any residual copper. These flasks will be used for the uninduced cultures","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"lc1j","text":"Fill 20 ml of each preculture adjusted to an OD730 of 0.5 back into the preculture flasks","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37hlc","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"38rh1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fs7o8","text":"These will be your uninduced cultures !","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"as1tq","text":"Fill 20 ml of each preculture adjusted to an OD730 of 0.5 into new 100ml erlenmeyer flasks with cotton plugs","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tedt","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ftlq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"50ol8","text":"These will be your induced cultures !","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7pg3p","text":"Add the respective inducer to the flasks prepared in Step 2.5","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhd6m","text":"To each Synechocystis strain carrying the following plasmid add 200 µl of the following inducer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"77po6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2r9n9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"97m8t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["178","207"],"data":[["strain","inducer"],["EVC","MilliQ water"],["prha_mVENUS","1M rhamnose"],["petE_mVENUS","100µM CuSo4"],["J23100_mVENUS","MilliQ preparation of the inducers please refer to our protocol \"BG11_and_inducer_preparation\".","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8pmte","text":"Put all flasks in a shaking incubators set at 100 rpm under 50 µmol photons · m-2  · s-1 constant white light illumination, ambient CO2, and 30°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":134,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddpe8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k3ua","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2kdpc","text":"Use 1 ml of BG11 to blank your spectrophotometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fl1m","text":"From each culture, take 1 ml sample at timepoint 0, 2, 4, 5, 6, 7 and 24h starting from the addition of the inducers and use this sample to perform the OD730 and fluorescence intensity measurements described in the following two section immediately after sampling","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4o489","text":"Measure the absorption at 730nm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j2ro","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4r4bk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dti4d","text":"For all samples at timepoint 0h and 7h, additionally measure the full 400-750 nm OD spectrum and of these cultures. This is your timepoint 0h and 7h value for the absorption spectrum.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

steps.section: Fluorescence- and OD730 measurements in the plate reader
Fluorescence- and OD730 measurements in the plate reader
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2ggd3","text":"Measure the absorbance of each well at 730nm","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Fluorescence- and OD730 measurements in the plate reader
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3tgm4","text":"Measure fluorescence of each well with an excitation of 511 nm/ 12 nm bandwidth and an emission of 552 nm/ 20 nm bandwidth","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
